Sequence Information.Peptide Name: CLP1 (cecropin-like peptide 1, UCLL1c, XXA, natural AMPs;insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals)

Literature Information.Literature: Host expression: real-time PCR revealed a 40,000-fold increase in CLP1 expression in the fat body and a 14,000-fold increase in the trachea before and after immunization.Discovery: purified chromatographically from the immunized hemolymph.Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (95.65%) toHill-Cec2GRAVY: -0.55; Mol W: 4901.618; Mol formula:  C216H354N71O59; Mol Ex coeff:  5550.Activity: Active against E. coli (MIC 0.52 uM),E. aerogenes (MIC 1.03 uM), and P. aeruginosa (MIC 1.03 uM). No activity was detected at 4.14 uM against Gram-positive bacteria (MRSA, S-aureus 40881, S-aureus 12256, S-epidermidis (MIC > 4.14 uM).
Literature Information.Author: Park S-I, Yoe SM. 2017
Literature Information.Title: A novel cecropin-like peptide from black soldier fly, Hermetia illucens: Isolation, structural and functional characterization
